Package com.j2igf.framework.graphics.visual

Class Animation

java.lang.Object
com.j2igf.framework.graphics.visual.Animation
public class Animation extends Object
This class is responsible for handling animations.
Author:
Aryan Rai

  • Constructor Details

    • Animation

      public Animation(SpriteSheet spriteSheet, Time time, boolean verticalScan, int offset, int size, float fps)
      This is the constructor of the Animation class.
      Parameters:
      spriteSheet - The SpriteSet object to use.
      time - The Time object to get the deltaTime while updating animation frame.
      verticalScan - Whether to scan the SpriteSet vertically or horizontally.
      offset - The offset of the first frame.
      size - The size of the animation.
      fps - The frames per second of the animation.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      This method updates the animation.

    • render

      public void render(Renderer renderer, int x, int y)
      This method renders the animation.
      Parameters:
      renderer - The Renderer object to use.
      x - The x coordinate of the animation.
      y - The y coordinate of the animation.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method resets the animation.
